tech_news.title: Return to the year 2000 with classic multiplayer DOS games in your browser - Ars Technica
tech_news.description: There are fan-made browser versions of Red Alert, Unreal Tournament, and more.

tech_news.title: How to know if your Asus router is one of thousands hacked by China-state hackers - arstechnica.com
tech_news.description: So far, the hackers are laying low, likely for later use.

tech_news.title: You can now try the Xbox Full Screen Experience on any PC, laptop, or tablet - The Verge
tech_news.description: Microsoft is bringing the Xbox Full Screen Experience (FSE) to laptops, desktops, and tablets. The new feature is rolling out as part of new Windows Insider builds.

tech_news.title: Early Black Friday Deals: Best Buy Has Upped Their Game, and So Has Amazon - IGN
tech_news.description: Best Buy and Amazon unleash massive Early Black Friday 2025 deals, including huge savings on gaming PCs, consoles, controllers, 3D printers, collectibles, handhelds, GPUs, and more.

tech_news.title: AirPods Pro 3 and AirPods 4 drop to their best prices yet for Black Friday Week [Updated] - 9to5Mac
tech_news.description: Amazon drops AirPods Pro 3 to their best price ever, with AirPods 4 ANC also seeing a major Black Friday discount.

tech_news.title: In Kirby Air Riders, expression is more fun than racing - The Verge
tech_news.description: Kirby Air Riders on the Nintendo Switch 2, a sequel to the quirky GameCube racing game, has a robust suite of customization options that are fun to play with.

tech_news.title: Apple, IBD Stock Of The Day, Sets Up Before Holiday Season - Investor's Business Daily
tech_news.description: The consumer electronics giant prepares for a busy shopping season.

tech_news.title: Ubisoft Reveals Teammates – An AI Experiment to Change the Game - Ubisoft
tech_news.description: The team behind last year’s Neo NPC is building on their experience to develop the future of generative play as an enhancement to gameplay with a new experimental experience already launched as a closed playtest.

tech_news.title: Microsoft: Out-of-band update fixes Windows 11 hotpatch install loop - BleepingComputer
tech_news.description: Microsoft has released an out-of-band cumulative update to fix a known issue causing the November 2025 KB5068966 hotpatch update to reinstall on Windows 11 systems repeatedly.
